import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Startup probe handler (`GET /startupz`)."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/startupz"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns 503 during initialization and 200 once startup is complete.
This is a one-time gate: once `startup_complete` is set to true, this
endpoint always returns 200 (FR-003, FR-014).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  {...require("./startupz-handler.RequestSchema.json")}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  {...require("./startupz-handler.StatusCodes.json")}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
